title: BBC Local Live: Cambridgeshire on Wednesday, 9 December 2015 - BBC News
summary: a 25-year-old man is arrested on sus of the murder of an inmate at peterborough prison .
stagecoach pulls out of bid to jointly run greater anglia rail franchise with abellio .
a sex offender is mistakenly released from littlehey prison a month early .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: that 's all from cambridgeshire live for today
text: we 'll be back at 08:00 with the latest news , sport , travel and weather in the county .
you can send us your stories and
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'nothing ' being done about health consequences of cousin marriages , claims peer
text: `` nothing '' has been done to tackle the potentially harmful health consequences for children of cousin marriages , says the uk 's first female asian peer .

a recent report revealed that a majority of asian children dying in peterborough had inherited disorders , after being born into marriage between cousins - although most children in cousin marriages are perfectly healthy .
baroness flather told bbc radio cambridgeshire : `` we have been afraid to talk about it . ''
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: weather : more cloud than last night but staying dry , minimum temperature 8c ( 46f )
text: a cloudier and milder night than last night is expected , although brief clear spells are also likely .
all parts should remain dry .
minimum temperature : 8c ( 46f ) .
tomorrow rain will spread south and east across all areas tomorrow morning , perhaps turning rather heavy in places .
for a more detailed forecast for where you live head to bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: cambridgeshire police takes part in biggest-ever vehicle procurement
text: cambridgeshire police is taking part in the biggest-ever vehicle procurement project by uk police and emergency services .
thirty-four organisations are pulling together to place an order for 3,000 vehicles over the next two years , rather than buying them separately , saving around £ 7m .
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: headlines : man arrested over death of inmate at hmp peterborough calls to tackle potential health consequences of cousin marriage
text: if you are just joining us here are the top stories in cambridgeshire :
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: is the england 's worst christmas tree
text: peterborough 's christmas tree was likened to a huge plate of ferrero rocher chocolates .
but is it the worst on display this year ?
a tree in nottinghamshire has been taken down after leaning `` more than the tower in pisa '' while another in leicestershire has been likened to a wizard 's hat .
they all feature in a round-up of the worst festive offerings in england .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: doctor 'had knife pulled on her ' during discussion on cousin marriage
text: a peterborough doctor has told me how a patient pulled a knife on her when she raised the potential dangers of birth defects in children born to cousin marriages .
most children born to cousins are healthy , and it remains a cultural tradition for many in the city 's pakistani community .
but the gp , who asked not to be named , thinks people need to be more aware of potentially fatal birth defects that can result .
my special report is broadcast on bbc radio cambridgeshire at 19:00 .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: 'eye-watering ' prices of cambridge student flats prompts 'gold rush ' among developers
text: the `` gold rush '' by developers to build student accommodation in cambridge has been condemned by a community fighting plans for hundreds of flats - while the city faces a `` chronic shortage '' of housing .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: picture : christmas makeover for festive phone box in haddenham
text: this festive phone box phone was spotted in the village of haddenham .
you can send us your festive photos via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: retired gp : 'more must be done ' to tackle 'heartbreaking ' cousin marriage birth defects
text: a retired peterborough gp says more needs to be done to stop children being born with genetic disorders to parents who are cousins .
a six-year review of child mortality in peterborough revealed that out of 36 asian children who died , the majority had died of congenital conditions , and were the offspring of cousin marriages .
most children born to cousins are healthy , but dr richard cartmel says he has seen some `` heartbreaking '' cases .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: thirty-year wait set to end as £ 120m revamp of peterborough 's fletton quays gets the green light
text: a 30-year 'carbuncle ' looks finally set to be removed from the peterborough landscape after a £ 120m revamp of fletton quays was given the go ahead .
author: Peterborough Telegraph

documents.title: peterborough prison death : company running hmp peterborough issue statement
text: an 25-year-old man has been arrested over the death of a male inmate at peterborough prison .
a spokesman from sodexo justice services , which runs the prison , said : `` the next of kin have been informed and our thoughts are with the family .
`` it would be inappropriate to comment further while the police investigation is underway . ''
author: Katy Prickett
BBC News

documents.title: weather : becoming a little cloudier this afternoon
text: it will become a little cloudier this afternoon with winds increasing .
maximum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
you can find a more detailed forecast for where you live at bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: the pi has arrived : spacecraft carrying raspberry pi computers docks at international space station
text: in the last hour a spacecraft carrying two raspberry pi computers has reached the international space station .
a robotic arm ( above ) is used to grasp the cygnus cargo craft to allow it to dock safely .
once on board the cambridge-designed computers will be used in experiments by british astronaut tim peake .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police quash social media rumours of cambridge bus station shooting - but are investigating damage
text: police have acted to quash rumours on social media of a shooting at cambridge bus station last night - but have confirmed they are investigating reports of criminal damage .
author: Cambridge News

text: here are the top stories in cambridgeshire :
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: peterborough inmate death : what we know about hmp peterborough
text: what we know about peterborough prison :
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: abellio to press ahead with bid to run east anglia trains
text: i understand that abellio intends to continue with its bid to run the east anglia franchise on its own after stagecoach pulled out of a joint deal .
the company says it has enough money to operate the service as a single venture .
author: Andrew Sinclair
BBC Look East political correspondent

documents.title: mp 'surprised ' by news on franchise deal
text: the decision by stagecoach to pull out of a deal to run the east anglia rail franchise with abellio has `` surprised '' norwich north conservative mp chloe smith .
stagecoach says it 's been unable to reach an agreement with abellio on certain elements of the bid .
stagecoach withdrawal is a surprise but we still expect whoever bids for greater anglia to deliver our high demands . ''
author: Andrew Sinclair
BBC Look East political correspondent

documents.title: stagecoach wo n't pursue deal with abellio for east anglia franchise
text: stagecoach has announced it will not be putting a joint bid to run the east anglia line with abellio greater anglia .
the firm announced the news a short while ago .

taking account of the other rail bidding opportunities that we anticipate over the next two years , we have decided not to proceed with an equity participation in the bid for the new east anglia franchise . ''
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: police investigation under way following peterborough prisoner death
text: cambridgeshire policesays a 25-year-old man has been arrested on sus of murder over the death of a male prisoner at peterborough prison .
officers were called to the category b prison at 01:45 .
author: Danny Shaw
BBC Home Affairs Correspondent

documents.title: breakingman arrested over death of inmate at peterborough prison
text: a man has been arrested over the death of a male prisoner at peterborough prison .
more to follow .
author: Danny Shaw
BBC Home Affairs Correspondent

documents.title: stagecoach 'unable ' to reach agreement with abellio on rail franchise bid
text: a stagecoach group spokesman said : `` we have been unable to reach an agreement with abellio on elements of the proposed bid .

`` as a result of that , and taking account of the other rail bidding opportunities that we anticipate over the next two years , we have decided not to proceed with an equity participation in the bid for the new east anglia franchise '' .
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: stagecoach pulls out of joint bid run 2017 greater anglia franchise
text: stagecoach has pulled out of joint bid with abellio to run the 2017 greater anglia franchise , the bbc has learned .
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: call for action to prevent genetic disorders from cousin marriage
text: a leading cambridge university geneticist says pre-marital testing for genetic disorders should be considered among members of peterborough 's pakistani community .
a recent report revealed that a majority of asian children dying in the city had inherited disorders , after being born into marriage between cousins .
although most children born to cousins are healthy , dr giles yo told bbc radio cambridgeshire action needed to be taken to prevent `` avoidable deaths . ''
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: wholesale price of fuel reducing 'dramatically '
text: an independent petrol retailer in cambridgeshire , says he has seen the wholesale price of fuel `` come down quite dramatically '' .
the rac believes the tumbling oil price will lead to a 3p-a-litre drop for petrol and 5p for diesel - the lowest for eight years .
steve highland , who runs a service station at bluntisham , says if the trend continues he hopes to be able pass on the reduction to customers .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: patrols stepped up in haddenham following rape arrest
text: police have stepped up patrols in haddenham , near ely , after a teenage girl was raped .
a 43-year-old man from the village was arrested on sus of rape last friday and is due to answer bail this saturday .
det ch insp donna wass said : `` my first priority is care for the victim and protection of the local community . ''
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: mistaken release of sex offender from littlehey prison 'extremely rare '
text: the mistaken early release of a sex offender from littlehey prison , near st neots , was an `` extremely rare '' incident , says the ministry of justice .
the inmate , from romania , was due for release on 6 january , but was deported on friday morning .
a spokesman said : `` he was placed in an immigration removal centre before being removed from the country the following day . ''
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: new street cleaning equipment to keep city centre tidy
text: new street cleaning equipment will be keeping peterborough city centre tidy this winter .
author: Peterborough Telegraph

documents.title: new gritter fleet saves council £ 200,000
text: a new fleet of high-tech gritters has saved £ 200,000 this year , cambridgeshire county council says .
the vehicles use technology to show how much salt has been spread on roads which , coupled with leasing the vehicles rather than buying them outright , has led to the savings .
the new gritters have been given names , including sir-spread-a-lot and salty mcgrit , by schoolchildren in the county .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: plan for 2,350-home cambourne west moves nearer
text: a decision on a fourth community for cambourne which will see the construction of nearly 2,500 new homes , is expected to be made early next year .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: weather : a sunny morning clouding over later , top temperature 11c ( 52f )
text: plenty of sunshine this morning but it will be getting cloudier later with winds increasing .
maximum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
you can find a more detailed forecast for where you live at bbc weather .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: sex offender released from hmp littlehey by mistake
text: a sex offender was mistakenly released from littlehey prison , in cambridgeshire , a month early , the bbc has learned .
the inmate , from romania , had been serving a 30-month sentence for sexually assaulting a girl under the age of 13 .
the ministry of justice says an investigation is now under way .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: headlines : sex offender released from hmp littlehey by mistake new gritters save council £ 200,000
